Links

Libraries that libics depends on:

  • zlib is the compression library used by libics.

Software that uses libics:

  • DIPlib and DIPimage, a scientific image analysis library and MATLAB toolbox.
  • pylibics, a Python wrapper for libics.
  • Huygens, fluorescence microscope image restoration tool.
  • The CBIA i3dcore and i3dalgo libraries, an image representation library and an image algorithm library.
  • IrfanView, Windows image viewer.

Software that uses the ICS file format:

  • Bio-Formats, a standalone Java library for reading and writing life sciences image file formats.
  • Ics Opener, an ImageJ plugin to read ICS files.
  • NIS-Elements, the Nikon microscope imaging software (Nikon confocal microscopes produce ICS files).

Other resources:

  • Wikipedia entry on ICS.
  • The Cytometry paper that first proposed the ICS standard.
